data.title: Schwarz Group
data.meta_description: With about 575,000 employees worldwide in 32 different countries, the Schwarz Group is among the top retailers in the world. Learn more about us.
data.text:
We are active on the international stage. Simply select one of our business areas to find out more about where we are present. Clicking on a country will bring you to a website with details on our local activities.

Select business area

Facts and figures on the Schwarz Group

575,000

employees

Diversity, commitment and passion – these are the strengths connecting our employees across all business units.

13,900

stores worldwide

We are where our customers need us.

7.2

billion customers in our stores per year

Retail is a business by people for people. As a leading retailer, we are part of the daily lives of millions of customers.

32

countries

To us, diversity also means keeping our international focus. Our retail formats prove to be successful every day in different markets and cultural environments.

167.2

billion euros in annual sales revenue in 2023

We set our sights high, keeping our focus on developing our business and setting the course for tomorrow’s success. This is reflected in our dynamic growth over the years. To us, new challenges mean opportunities.
